WorkItem.Description:
This will allow specifying values of an Enum, or other known objects (in WPF - obviously; with SL5 it makes even more sense when x:Static is allowed by implementing IMarkupExtension<T>).
It should simply work that the the SetRegionName method of the attached RegionName property should convert to value to accept multiple types.
Â 
Same thing should be with Views and other.
WorkItem.Summary: RegionManager.RegionName should be an object, not a string
